metadata.description: Virtual network address prefix to use
Address prefix for web app integration subnet
Address prefix for private links subnet
Location to deploy the resources
Log Analytics workspace name
Log Analytics workspace pricing tier
Location to deploy the resources
Name of the storage account to create. Must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and may contain numbers and lowercase letters only.
Storage account SKU
Storage account kind
Indicates whether https traffic only should be enabled. Default is true.
File share to store application files
Additional properties for the file share, e.g., shareQuota. See https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/templates/microsoft.storage/storageaccounts/fileservices/shares for details.

parameters.siteUrl: [if(equals(parameters('deploymentConfiguration'), 'Web app with Azure Front Door'), createObject('value', format('https://{0}', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Resources/deployments', 'FrontDoorDeploy'), '2022-09-01').outputs.frontDoorEndpointHostName.value)), createObject('value', format('https://{0}', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Resources/deployments', 'webAppDeploy'), '2022-09-01').outputs.hostName.value)))]
